awsm.fish !Awesomehttps://awesome.re > Fish is the sassy & user-friendly command line shell you never knew you needed for Linux, macOS, and the whole gang. Out with the old-fashioned shells that skimp on features for the sake of every last byte of RAM‚Äîfinally, a command line shell for the 90s! Welcome to the ultimate treasure trove of handpicked plugins, prompts, and other Fish goodies. You see, this isn't just any collection‚Äîwe curate only the best of the best Fish projects for your friendly interactive shell. Got a top-notch project you want featured here? Send us a pull request, join the crew! Contents - Official Resources - Community Resources - Prompts - Plugins - Docker Official Resources - Official Site - GitHub Repository - Try in browser! üç§ Community Resources - r/fishshell - The Reddit hangout - Gitter Channel - Come chat with us! - Stack Overflow - Got questions? We've got answers! - The Fish Cookbook - From Shell to Plate: Savor the Zest of Fish ü¶û Prompts - Tide - A modern prompt manager for Fish - Pure - That ZSH prompt, now in Fish flavor - Hydro - Lag-free prompt with async Git status ooh la la Plugins - z - Pure-Fish https://github.com/rupa/z-like directory jumping - fzf - Ef-üêü-ient key bindings for https://github.com/junegunn/fzf. Alternative - nvm - Node.js version manager lovingly made for Fish - Done - Automatically receive notifications after a long process finishes - Replay - Run Bash commands replaying changes in Fish. Alternative - Spark - Sparklines for Fish - Fisher - Manage functions, completions, bindings, and snippets from the CLI - Fundle - -based plugin manager - GitNow - A collection of utility functions to speed up your git workflow - Sponge - Clean command history from typos automatically - Autopair - Auto-complete matching pairs in the Fish command-line. Alternative - Getopts - CLI options parser alternative to the https://fishshell.com/docs/current/cmds/argparse.html builtin - Fishtape - TAP-based test runner for Fish - Pufferfish - Text Expansions for Fish - Projectdo - Context-aware single-letter abbreviations to build, run, and test any project - Virtualfish - Virtualenv wrapper - Async Prompt - Make your prompt asynchronous - Apple Touchbar - Customize your Touch Bar in iTerm2 - Abbreviation Tips - Remembering abbreviations by displaying tips when you can use them - Base16 Fish - A pure Fish solution to change your shell's default ANSI colors Docker - Alpine Image - Ubuntu LTS Image
